comments.author: Julian Reschke
comments.body:
Turns out that there are more assumptions wrt the single-valued-ness.

Revised proposal: update code so that the mv-ness of the desired property can be specified by the test case.

comments.author: Julian Reschke
comments.body: Fixed subsequent failure in spi/client with revision 570565.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Merged to the 1.3 branch in revision 577867.

description: The setUp() method uses prop.getNode(), thus assuming that the reference property is not multivalued.
summary: ReferencesPropertyTest can't deal with multivalued reference properties
